Tropical Sheet Tweaks;
An extension dedicated to enhancing google sheets

Current Tweaks (Features):
  ➔ Custom Default Zoom Level
  ➔ Always Show Chart Tooltips
  ➔ Modern "Running Script" Box
  ➔ Confirm Edit On Drawing Click
  ➔ Button-Like Drawings (Now with pointer cursor on hover)


Limit Functionality To Certain Sheets:
- To limit the tweaks to only work in specific sheets, you can list names, or name segments of the sheets you want to tweak in a comma seperated list.


If you notice your sheet sometimes freezes when switching tabs, try disabling some tweaks.
